sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' class ListBookShelfs extends Component{ static propTypes = { currently_reading: PropTypes.array.isRequired, want_to_read: PropTypes.array.isRequired, read: PropTypes.array.isRequired } render (){ const { currently_reading} = this.props //let showing_currently_reading, showing_want_to_read,showing_read console.log(this.props) return(

MyReads

Currently Reading

    {currently_reading.map((book) => (
  1. book.title
    David McCullough
    2. ))}

Want to Read

  1. 1776
    David McCullough
  2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
    J.K. Rowling

Read

  1. The Hobbit
    J.R.R. Tolkien
  2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
    Seuss
  3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
    Mark Twain
) } } export default ListBookShelfs
